General.Name: Ober SA
General.Description: Ober SA provides decorative and technical surfaces for interior fittings in France. It provides wood, concrete, paper, metal, and resin surfaces for the layout of shops, offices, hotels, meeting, or show rooms, as well as for the decoration of private houses. The company also publishes accessories and design objects in noble materials of the Shelter brand. It sells its products under the Oberflex, Concete LCDA, Marotte, Pure Paper, and SuperOrganic brands. Ober SA was founded in 1925 and is headquartered in Bar Le Duc, France.
General.Address: 31, rue de Bar, Bar Le Duc, France, 55000
